title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater well-made and comfortable, with one noting it's the coziest long-sleeve non-hoodie. Customers like its size, describing it as huge, and its color accuracy, with one noting there's no color fading.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loveeeee
items.body: I’m obsessed with this sweater! It is the softest, comfiest long-sleeve non-hoodie that I own. It’s dressy enough that I can wear it to work, but also casual enough for any occasion. I ordered a size small - I’m 5’8”, D, 185 at the moment but I bought this when I was 10-15 lbs smaller and it still fits perfectly. I get compliments every time I wear it. I did order it in more colors (of course lol) and only kept one other - I returned the blue & gray colors because they just didn’t work for my skin tone. Read more
items.author: Blue

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best sweater
items.body: Love this sweater. It is so soft and not scratchy at all. The colors are accurate and the fit is true to size. It is looser fitting but not oversized. I’m 5’ 9” and the length of the torso and the sleeves are perfect. I’m going to order more colors I love it so much. Read more
items.author: Stacey Kirschenmann

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bright, Cozy, and Such a Fun Pattern
items.body: This sweater is so cute in person. The color block design feels cheerful and stylish and the knit is soft and comfy for everyday wear. It has that perfectly oversized fit that looks great with leggings or jeans and I love how easy it is to throw on and feel put together. Read more
items.author: Emily Swanson

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Huge, HUGE Sweater
items.body: I received my sweater yesterday and tried it on last night. I was swimming in this sweater! Amazon recommended I buy an Extra Large but I knew that wouldn't be right so I bought a Large and I'm going to return it and get the Medium but I might actually get the Small! I am 5'4" and weigh 180 lbs. I have size 36DD boobs and this sweater makes me look like I'm a little girl wearing my mother's clothes! It is a nice sweater and the colors are very true I bought black with the color blocking. I just want to advise everyone if you're thinking of ordering this go a size down if not two sizes down. Read more
items.author: Yay or Nay

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute sweater that’s made well for the price
items.body: This sweater was recommended to me by my niece. So glad I ordered it because it’s super cute on and made very well. Read more
items.author: Sal L.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater
items.body: Super cute! Comfortable, soft sweater Read more
items.author: Hammerhead

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Snagged way too easily
items.body: Snagged on the first wear. Very cute but bummed. Read more
items.author: Christine

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy the sweater
items.body: I love this sweater! Just the right amount of thickness and softness. I am postpartum and have struggled to find a top that is comfortable and long enough to cover my healing belly without looking like it’s too big. This is perfect. I am 170 lbs, 5’5” and I got a medium. Read more
items.author: Lindsey

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pure Black, Pure Apricot, Color Blue, Color Caramel, Pure Brown, Color Darkgreen, Pure Grey, Color Black, Pure Pink, Amy Green, Pure Blue, Double Khaki. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
